=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/08/09 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jason Reitman'], 'Producers': ['Lianne Halfon', 'Russell Smith', 'Jason Reitman'], 'Starring': ['Josh Brolin', 'Kate Winslet'], 'Studio': ['Drama']} Review Text: This movie is an excellent movie. A timeless love is forged at an unusual time. It is happy, sad, and yet has an AWESOME ending.
A few days in a mom and sons life forges who they will be the rest of their lives.
Get some kleenex and watch a GREAT movie. Review Title: Excellent movie on understanding, romance, and love Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

{'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jean-Jacques Annaud'], 'Producers': ['Claude Berri', 'Pierre Grunstein'], 'Starring': ['Jack Wallace', 'Tchéky Karyo', 'Andre Lacombe'], 'Studio': ['Shout! Factory', 'LLC']} This is a story based in 1885 it is an excellent story of survival. I cannot say more without ruining the plot. If you love animals and a little scare this is an excellent movie. Well played. Beautiful wildlife scenes {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul Ziller'], 'Producers': ['David Perlmutter', 'Mary Sparacio'], 'Starring': ['Kaitlyn Burke', 'Alan Thicke', 'Michael Ontkeen'], 'Studio': ['Questar', 'Inc']} Since there are bear hunters pictured in this movie who shoot at a bear I would not suggest a child under 9 or 10 watch this movie. However, no bears are killed in the movie and not bears were harmed making the movie.

Excellent film Whole family will enjoy this movie {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Nick Tomnay'], 'Producers': ['Rick Feder', 'Sarah Johnson', 'Stacey Testro', 'Mark Victor', 'Martin Zoland'], 'Starring': ['Tyrees Allen', 'Nathaniel Parker', 'Clayne Crawford'], 'Studio': ['Magnet Releasing', 'Magnolia Home Entertainment']} A mundane plot turned into an unusual and interesting movie. Unusual The Tunnel (English Dub) Suspense, Drama, Bold, Compelling ['A tank truck crashes in a tunnel in the ice-cold Norwegian mountains, brutally trapping families, teenagers and tourists on their way home for Christmas. A blizzard is raging outside and the first responders struggle to get to the scene of the accident. The wrecked tanker catches fire and the tunnel is filled with deadly smoke. Will the help get there in time?'] {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Pål Øie'], 'Producers': ['John Einar Hagen', 'Einar Loftesnes'], 'Starring': ['Thorbjørn Harr', 'Ylva Lyng Fuglerud', 'Lisa Carlehed']} This movie is a dubbed foreign film, however, you can't tell it. They did a good job. The scenery is beautiful, the special effects are great, and the suspense will have you sitting on the edge of your seat. Excellent Suspense The Tomorrow War Suspense, Drama, Compelling, Frightening ['Time travelers arrive from 2051 to deliver an urgent message: 30 years in the future mankind is losing a war against a deadly alien species. The only hope for survival is for soldiers and civilians to be transported to the future and join the fight. Determined to save the world for his daughter, Dan Forester teams up with a brilliant scientist and his estranged father to rewrite the planet’s fate.'] {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Français (Canada)', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'தமிழ்', 'हिन्दी', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Čeština', 'Magyar', 'తెలుగు', 'Français (France)'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français (Canada)', 'Français (France)', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Chris McKay'], 'Producers': ['Rob Cowan', 'Leifur B. You will sit on the edge of your seat in more than one spot. The energy, the terror, and the exhilaration of this event all come through. Viggo Mortensen, Colin Farrell, and Joel Edgeton gave excellent performances. My hate is off to Ron Howard, not many directors could take a situation like this and put you there the way he has. Congratulations to the whole crew. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preferences:** The user consistently favors survival-themed narratives and suspenseful dramas, with a recent interaction emphasizing their strong engagement with stories that explore the complexities of love and relationships, even under unconventional circumstances.

- **Content Appreciation:** They have shown a deepened enthusiasm for films that combine emotional depth with innovative storytelling, successfully balancing their critical perspective with a willingness to embrace moving narratives that elicit strong emotional responses.

- **Visual and Audio Elements:** A continued focus on high-quality visuals and immersive soundscapes is evident, with particular attention to accessibility features like audio descriptions, which enhance their overall viewing experience.

- **Rating Tendencies:** The user has evolved into a more discerning critic, now placing significant emphasis on storytelling depth and emotional resonance, as demonstrated by their recent five-star rating indicative of their appreciation for nuanced narratives.

- **Viewing Experience:** In pursuit of captivating cinematic experiences, the user is highly selective about content that aligns with their expectations for insightful direction and high production quality, along with a desire for relatable emotional stakes.

- **Language Accessibility:** They continue to favor English-language content accompanied by high-quality audio descriptions and subtitles, reinforcing their commitment to a comprehensive and accessible viewing experience.

Overall, the user seeks emotionally gripping narratives with high production values, alongside a growing openness to creative storytelling that resonates deeply.
